snippet: William Egan, a Bank of America Merrill Lynch top investment banker for financial institutions, has resigned to join credit investment and private equity firm Oaktree Capital Group LLC, according to people familiar with the matter....

headline.print_headline: Exclusive: Top Bank of America Financial Companies Banker Leaves for Oaktree-Sources
headline.main: Exclusive: Top Bank of America Financial Companies Banker Leaves for Oaktree-Sources

lead_paragraph: William Egan, a Bank of America Merrill Lynch top investment banker for financial institutions, has resigned to join credit investment and private equity firm Oaktree Capital Group LLC, according to people familiar with the matter.
